name: orion-demo-app
description: GraphQL Demo App with AWS Lambda deployment

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm install --prefix deploy-cli
scripts.deploy:init: npm run build:cli && node deploy-cli/dist/index.js init
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:cli && node deploy-cli/dist/index.js build
scripts.deploy:apply: npm run build:cli && node deploy-cli/dist/index.js apply
scripts.deploy:destroy: npm run build:cli && node deploy-cli/dist/index.js destroy
